version_description:
- App Icon
We have removed the white border. For a clean and modern appearance.

- Bugfix
Also we have fixed some issues on the Apple Watch App.

- App Icon
We have removed the white border. For a clean and modern appearance.

- Bugfix
Also we have fixed some issues on the Apple Watch App.

Hey there, we have a great update for you! :-)

New Features
- Pilly! notifies you when you have no blisters left
- 30 and 60 minutes shortcuts on "Taken Earlier"

iOS 10 Adjustments
- Pilly! is fully iOS 10 compatible now
- New Widget Design

watchOS 3 Adjustments
- Pilly! is fully watchOS 3 compatible now
- New Watch Complications for quick access to Pilly!

Have fun! And don't forget to rate Pilly! on the App Store! :-)

Hey there, we have a great update for you! :-)

New Features
- Pilly! notifies you when you have no blisters left
- 30 and 60 minutes shortcuts on "Taken Earlier"

iOS 10 Adjustments
- Pilly! is fully iOS 10 compatible now
- New Widget Design

watchOS 3 Adjustments
- Pilly! is fully watchOS 3 compatible now
- New Watch Complications for quick access to Pilly!

Have fun! And don't forget to rate Pilly! on the App Store! :-)

Spotlight:
- You can search through your notes via Spotlight from now on!

Bugfix:
- We have fixed some issues with notifications on iOS 10 devices

Spotlight:
- You can search through your notes via Spotlight from now on!

Bugfix:
- We have fixed some issues with notifications on iOS 10 devices

Positive Vibes
- We have integrated the Taptic Engine for iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus users!

Bugfixes
- Additionally some small improvements.

Positive Vibes
- We have integrated the Taptic Engine for iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus users!

Bugfixes
- Additionally some small improvements.

.: New Appearance :.
We have improved the color scheme of Pilly! a little bit. Do you like it as much as we do? :-)

.: Support Document :.
You have issues with notifications? We have added a link to a support document which should help you. You can find it at the bottom of the settings view.

.: Bugfixing :.
And like always we have fixed some bugs :]
